评论详情: It is always hard to find great quality, that lasts wash after was,  and this is one of those tops. I am 5’11” so everything shrinks after you wash it. Not this top! The length, color and softness stays! Will forever continue to purchase from this brand.

Love the weight and feeling of the material, high quality sports shirt. I personally prefer not checking to see if my shirt is staying put on my waistline while working out so I like a bit more length. Although in my 20’s it never would’ve crossed my mind. Beautiful shirt that fits as expected if this is the cut for you- don’t hesitate!!! I’m 158 lbs and 5’6”. Hope this helps
Great fit! The color is perfect and the material is so soft and comfortable to use for Pilates.
Love this long sleeve shirt.  Although I own several like these, this one has a little more coverage on the back that keeps me warmer during these cold days.  Really like the fabric!
Good fit and nice color, with soft fabric. I like the flair with the back of the top. I kinda wish there was a bit of flair in the front as it's very basic looking.
I Love my white shirt. I wear during my work out and when i am running my errands. I do recommend wearing a white tank top underneath.

This shirt hits right at the waist line so if you choose to wear it without a shirt under it your belly will hang out. I wear a tank top or cami under it to spare others the trauma of having to see my stomach. It is a soft comfortable shirt. I love the thumb holes. I’m a sucker for a shirt with thumb holes. The color is true to the listing photo. I love this shirt.
I ordered an XL and it is skin tight. Cute but not loose fitting like the picture. I am normally a size 10/12 top.

评论概述: Nice material had to return ordered the wrong size
评论详情: I ordered a extra large too big, nice material

评论概述: Women's Long Sleeve Yoga Top with Cutout Back
评论详情: I love this top. It is comfortable to wear and very fashionable. The fabric is so soft you will forget it's there. I will be ordering one in every color. These do fit true to size but you might think about ordering a size up just to make sure.
I coach Gymnastics and am always in search of cute yet functional athletic wear. I love how cute this looks on while also be breathable and comfortable to coach in. Definitely recommend
Great fabric for working out.  I really like it - it’s comfortable.
Love this top, I can wear to work out or to the office with a cardigan over it. Very pretty
